com.yahoo.config.provision

Class HostSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.config.provision.HostSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<HostSpec>

    public class HostSpec
extends Object
implements Comparable<HostSpec>
    A specification of a host and its role. The identity of a host is determined by its name.
    Author:
    hmusum
